Read the data





```{r}
artslist <- read.csv("../../Raw data/artsliste.csv")
```


Get total observations in Cover
```{r}
data_2014$total_obs <- rowSums(data_2014[,grep("Cover", names(data_2014))])
```



```{r}
data_2014 <- simple_shanon_index(data_2014)
data_5130 <- simple_shanon_index(data_5130)
```



Get a yes no value if there is detected enebærbuske.
```{r}
data_2014$enebær <- ifelse(rowSums(data_2014[, grep(paste(c(find_art_nr("Juniperus", latin =  TRUE)[,1]), collapse="|"), names(data_2014))]) > 0,1,0)

data_5130$enebær <- ifelse(rowSums(data_5130[, grep(paste(c(find_art_nr("Juniperus", latin =  TRUE)[,1]), collapse="|"), names(data_5130))]) > 0,1,0)
```


```{r}
find_art_nr("Juniperus", latin =  TRUE)
```


Save the changes
```{r}
write.csv(data_2014, file = "../Data/Processed data//data_2014_5130.csv", row.names=FALSE)
write.csv(data_5130, file = "../Data/Processed data//data_5130.csv", row.names=FALSE)
```
